wikipedia_page.main: Major General Robert Duncan Seaton Gordon,  (born 23 November 1950) is a former British Army officer who commanded the 2nd Division from 1999 to 2002 and served as Force Commander of the United Nations Mission in Ethiopia and Eritrea from 2002 to 2005.
